email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $52.50 per ton for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel 'Ocean Voyager' is available with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. Laycan is 10th-15th October. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $50.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s condition and any recent inspections?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

I understand your concern. After discussing with the owner, we can lower the rate to $51.25 per ton. The 'Ocean Voyager' underwent a full inspection last month and is in excellent condition. Laycan remains 10th-15th October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the adjustment. We can agree to $51.25 per ton. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Great! The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the quick turnaround. We’ll review the charter party and revert by tomorrow. Looking forward to finalizing this.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Just following up on the charter party. Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarifications.

Best,
Sarah
